Package com.vuzix.connectivity.sdk

Class Connectivity.DeviceListenerAdapter

java.lang.Object
com.vuzix.connectivity.sdk.Connectivity.DeviceListenerAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Connectivity.DeviceListener
Enclosing class:
Connectivity
public static class Connectivity.DeviceListenerAdapter extends Object implements Connectivity.DeviceListener
Convenience class for implementing a DeviceListener without having to implement all methods.
